page.title: 11LEISURE: Children's Hobbies
page.content: We found out many things about people's interests. Many children are in school teams, groups and clubs and both adults and children can take part in activities in schools during the evenings. About{74%}of our sample of 60 are in a school team or club. Nearly{90%}go to a club or are in an activity outside school. These are some of the hobbies which the children have: Tennis Swimming Squash Riding Rock-climbing Showing dogs Dancing Snooker Jogging Guides Kung Fu Fencing Cycling Keeping pets Trampolining Gymnastics Fishing Roller skating Darts Badminton.
